select IFNULL(t.areaCode,'') as areaCode, case p.type when '4' then '常德市' when '3' then concat_ws(">",'常德市',p.name) when '2' then concat_ws(">", ppp.ppNames,pp.pName,p.name) when '1' then concat_ws(">",'常德市', ppp.ppNames,pp.pName,p.name) end areaName from portal_hqgj.users t left join portal_hqgj.province p on p.code=t.areaCode left join ( select name as pName, p.`code` as pCode, parent_code as ppCode from portal_hqgj.province p )pp on pp.pCode = p.parent_code left join (select name as ppNames, p.`code` as pppcode from portal_hqgj.province p )ppp on ppp.pppcode = pp.ppCode where t.curSyid = #{sysId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
